testcase.classname: Feature is to test login functionality
testcase.name: Check unsucessful login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Check Browser is open.................................................passed And User is on AutomationPractice login page................................passed When User enters invalid muhammad.junaid50@gmail.com and 012345678..........passed And Clicks on login button..................................................passed Then System will show an error message......................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature is to test T_Shirt purchasing
testcase.name: Purchase a T_Shirt
testcase.system-out: Given Check Browser is open and user is loggedin............................passed And User click on T_Shirt tab...............................................passed And User will hover over T_Shirt item and will click Quick View button......passed When User clicks on Add_TO_Cart button......................................passed And Clicks on proceed to checkout button....................................passed And Agree the term and conditions and click on proceed to checkout..........passed Then Selects the payment method.............................................passed And Clicks I confirm my order and back to my orders.........................passed
